item.title: github: Copilot usage metrics dashboard and API in public preview
item.description:
GitHub announced that a Copilot usage metrics dashboard and a corresponding API are available in public preview for GitHub Enterprise, allowing organizations to view and programmatically access Copilot usage metrics.

item.title: github: Product-specific billing APIs are closing down
item.description:
GitHub is closing down the remaining product-specific billing APIs for Actions, Packages, and shared storage, following earlier notices about Actions workflow usage endpoints.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: k8s: Kubernetes v1.34: Recovery From Volume Expansion Failure (GA)
item.description: Kubernetes v1.34 graduates automated recovery from failed persistent volume expansions to GA. Users can correct an over-sized PersistentVolumeClaim (PVC) by reducing the requested size (as long as the new request is still larger than the PV’s original capacity) without cluster-admin intervention; consumed quota from a failed expansion is returned automatically. The release also introduces improved observability and error reporting for expansion operations, retries with reduced request rates, and several resizing workflow bug fixes.

item.title: github: A REST API for GitHub Projects, sub-issues improvements, and more
item.description:
GitHub announced a REST API for GitHub Projects so developers can read and manage project data programmatically, plus enhancements to sub-issues to make breaking down work easier and other related improvements.

  • Source: GitHub
